I am a GSOC 2014 aspirant. 13:20 <sayAsh> As the instructions says I am building phenotips can anybody say me how much time it will take . It is around 50 minutes now and still it is building 13:24 <vishnu93> it takes quite some time 13:24 <vishnu93> wait till the files are finished downloading 13:25 <sayAsh> ok thanks 13:54 <sayAsh> has quit 14:05 <IonelPopescu> has quit 14:50 <vishnu93> has quit 14:58 <akif500> has quit 15:05 <nclandrei> has joined #phenotips 15:05 <nclandrei> hi everyone (-: 15:10 <akats> Hello 15:11 <nclandrei> how is work going? 15:21 <akats> Everyone has been working really hard 15:21 <nclandrei> oh okay then 15:22 <nclandrei> I won't bother you then.. I'll just hang around so if something happens I can see it :D 15:22 <nclandrei> I'm working out the code sdumitriu sent me yesterday, trying to figure it our 15:22 <nclandrei> out* 15:25 <akats> Keep hacking :) 15:27 <nclandrei> thanks, have easy work there 15:32 <akats> Thank you 16:24 <akats> sdumitriu: The GET parameter xpage= when appended to a URL makes the page use a .vm template? 16:24 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:25 <akats> That explains so much. Thanks. 18:05 <sdumitriu> Hey nclandrei 18:05 <sdumitriu> How's it going? 18:12 <nairboon> has quit 18:14 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 18:15 <akats> has quit 18:15 <nclandrei> hi sdumitriu 18:16 <nclandrei> nice to hear from you :D 18:16 <nclandrei> I was around, going through the code, playing with multiple users on PhenoTips 18:16 <nclandrei> I was just trying to get into the entire idea of this linear history 18:16 <nclandrei> of a record 18:27 <nclandrei> how about you? :D 18:36 <ionel_> has joined #phenotips 18:42 <IonelPopescu> has quit 18:54 <sdumitriu> is now known as <sdumitriu_[away]> 19:03 <ionel_> has quit 19:22 <nclandrei> I'm going to sleep 19:22 <nclandrei> talk to you tomorrow good night ! 19:22 <nclandrei> has quit 19:34 <ionel_> has joined #phenotips 20:40 <raghav_> has quit 21:08 <ionel_> has quit
